statements: DELETE FROM device_settings WHERE firmware_version = 'v1.2' AND last_update < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DeviceConfigSettings WHERE device_id = 100 AND param_name = 'location';
DELETE FROM DeviceCommands WHERE device_id = 2001 AND command_type = 'reboot';
DELETE FROM DeviceCommands WHERE device_id = 123 AND command_id = 456;
DELETE FROM Network WHERE device_id = 5 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
DELETE FROM Configuration WHERE device_id = 3 AND config_name = 'Settings';
